description: Comprehensive monthly budget execution analysis across all ministries and budget lines

sections.description: Taxpayer compliance metrics and trends

description: Comprehensive procurement performance metrics including cycle times, savings, and compliance

sections.description: Procurement savings vs. market benchmarks

description: Tracking and analysis of audit findings, implementation status, and trends

sections.description: Total findings by entity and severity

sections.description: Progress on audit recommendation implementation

sections.description: Monetary value of findings and recoveries

sections.name: Entity Performance
sections.description: Compliance scores and rankings

sections.description: Grant-funded project outcomes and impacts
